nodes.bodyText: This change seems implies that the newer zookeeper operator is not backward compatible. Is that the case ? if yes could share the zookeeper-operator version above which this change will work.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -239,7 +239,7 @@ private V1Deployment getDeployment() {
                 .put("kind", CUSTOM_RESOURCE_KIND)
                 .put("metadata", ImmutableMap.of("name", deploymentName))
                 .put("spec", ImmutableMap.builder().put("image",  getImageSpec(DOCKER_REGISTRY + PREFIX + "/" + ZOOKEEPER_IMAGE_NAME, PRAVEGA_ZOOKEEPER_IMAGE_VERSION))
-                                         .put("size", clusterSize)
+                                         .put("replicas", clusterSize)

nodes.bodyText: The changes are backward compatible as replicas filed is available in previous zookeeper  versions as well.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -239,7 +239,7 @@ private V1Deployment getDeployment() {
                 .put("kind", CUSTOM_RESOURCE_KIND)
                 .put("metadata", ImmutableMap.of("name", deploymentName))
                 .put("spec", ImmutableMap.builder().put("image",  getImageSpec(DOCKER_REGISTRY + PREFIX + "/" + ZOOKEEPER_IMAGE_NAME, PRAVEGA_ZOOKEEPER_IMAGE_VERSION))
-                                         .put("size", clusterSize)
+                                         .put("replicas", clusterSize)
